title: Black Market Brawlers is too much like normals.
body: Apart from a couple of fun items and Razorbacks, I haven't really noticed much of a difference. I like my features modes to be more different than this.

replies.body: Games go by faster. Usualy I have games in normals go from 30-40 minutes with the occasional under 30 if our team is awesome. But with black markert its like 20-30 minute games. The brawlers make wave clear alot easier and harder. I mean nemisis was just like normals all they did was make it so you had to play weird comps.
Agreed.  The new minions/brawlers have been fun.  The lack of teamwork in lobby and IG happens regardless of mode.  Nemesis was interesting and a nice change of pace. : )
Exactly, these game modes or more for fun and to mess around in. If people dont like it then they should just go back to normals or ranked.

I tried it once, waited for every one to pick a champion and then to ban champions etc.

I was the last in line to chose a champion and right before I could some one quit, so I just never played it again.

I'd rather this game mode be tied into team builder some how, instead of every one spamming the roles they want like it's season 2 still.
AGREED MY MAN, Its So Boring LOL I Rather Play Blind Pick Than Black Market. I HAVE NO TIME BUYING STUPID BRAWLERS THAT ARE GOING TO DIE IN LIKE 2 SECONDS. I Could Have Been In Lane Right Now XD.
I couldn't agree more with this. It's just too little change to the game.
